title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours:  Antoine Griezmann, Leon Bailey and Paulo Dybala
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Tuesday, January 9.
content: Atletico Madrid forward Antoine Griezmann wants £400,000 a week to sign for United and snub Barcelona, reports the Daily Mail.The France international had been expected to join Barca next season.Jose Mourinho is said to still be angry with the United board after being forced to choose between signing Nemanja Matic and Ivan Perisic over the summer, according to reports in the Daily Express.In the end, the 'Special One' opted to sign the holding midfielder from Chelsea.United, meanwhile, are interested in landing Bayer Leverkusen's £40m+ rated-winger Leon Bailey at the end of the season, says the Mirror.However, they will have to battle it out with both Chelsea and Arsenal to try and land the player this summer.The paper also says that Paris Saint-Germain have ruled out making a summer move for Juventus striker Paulo Dybala.As a result, that has now opened the door for United to make their own move for the highly-rated Argentina international.
